amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to expand the definition of domestic violence in the Indian Civil Rights Act of 1968, as amended by the bill, to include violence against or witnessed by a child under the age of 18, or an elder (as defined by tribal law).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
